Parameters: Transition: The transition which reached its end.
onTransitionEnd(android.transition.Trans.Description: Notification about the end of the transition. Canceled transitions will always notify listeners of both the cancellation and end events. That is, @B_android#transition#Transition#TransitionListener#onTransitionEnd_E@ is always called, regardless of whether the transition was canceled or played through to completion.

Parameters: Transition: The transition which was paused.
onTransitionPause(android.transition.Tra.Description: Notification when a transition is paused. Note that createAnimator() may be called by a parent @B_android#transition#TransitionSet_E@ on a child transition which has not yet started. This allows the child transition to restore state on target objects which was set at @B_android#transition#Transition#createAnimator_E@ time.

onTransitionStart(android.transition.Tra.Description: Notification about the start of the transition.

Parameters: Transition: The transition which was canceled.
onTransitionCancel(android.transition.Tr.Description: Notification about the cancellation of the transition. Note that cancel may be called by a parent @B_android#transition#TransitionSet_E@ on a child transition which has not yet started. This allows the child transition to restore state on target objects which was set at @B_android#transition#Transition#createAnimator_E@ time.

Parameters: Transition: The transition which was resumed.
onTransitionResume(android.transition.Tr.Description: Notification when a transition is resumed. Note that resume() may be called by a parent @B_android#transition#TransitionSet_E@ on a child transition which has not yet started. This allows the child transition to restore state which may have changed in an earlier call to @B_android#transition#Transition#TransitionListener#onTransitionPause_E@.

ClassDesc: A transition listener receives notifications from a transition. Notifications indicate transition lifecycle events.
